text: Dexys, also known as Dexys Midnight Runners, are an English pop rock band from Birmingham. They were active from 1978 to 2011. They were commercially successful in the early 1980s. They had two songs reach the No. 1 position on the UK Singles Chart. These were "Geno" and "Come On Eileen" (1982). "Come On Eileen" was No. 1 on the US Billboard Hot 100. ==References== Category:British musical groups Category:English rock bands
title: Dexys Midnight Runners
